description: With Smartwatch Center for Android Wear you get all android wear apps, games, news & watchfaces for your Android Wear smartwatch in one place. Do you have trouble finding watch apps for your Android Wear smartwatch? This app contains all top apps, games and watchfaces for Android Wear. It is simple, fast and easy to use. Discover top rated, brand new apps and trending apps easily using appropriate filtering mechanisms. Choose from over 2200 Apps your favorites for your Android Wear smartwatch. This app is free and has no ads. Find best Android Wear watch apps in our recommendation list. With the built-in app manager you can manage installed wear apps.New:★ Discover trending Android Wear apps★ Manage your Android Wear Apps on phone★ Stay tuned with our Android Wear newsticker★ All apps, games and watch faces for Android Wear also online at: http://www.androidwearcenter.comFeatures:★ Modern design★ Super fast★ Manage your installed Android Wear apps★ Recommendation for best Android Wear apps★ New Apps, Games and Watch Faces for Android Wear are updated continuously★ News about Android Wear★ Quick access to top apps★ Apps and Games are ordered by categories★ A list of all Android Wear Apps★ A list of all Android Wear Games★ A list of all Android Wear Watch Faces★ Separate listing of all Android Wear Apps, which are promoted by Google★ No Ads and completely freeFind apps, watchfaces and games for following devices:► HUAWEI Watch► Moto 360 Gen 2 (2015)► Moto 360 Gen 1 (2014)► Asus Zenwatch► LG G Watch► LG G Watch R► LG G Watch Urbane (Android Wear version)► Samsung Gear Live► Sony SmartWatch 3Do you have suggestions for improvements? Any ideas or problems with the app. Let us know.
descriptionHTML:
With Smartwatch Center for Android Wear you get all android wear apps, games, news & watchfaces for your Android Wear smartwatch in one place. Do you have trouble finding watch apps for your Android Wear smartwatch? This app contains all top apps, games and watchfaces for Android Wear. It is simple, fast and easy to use. Discover top rated, brand new apps and trending apps easily using appropriate filtering mechanisms. Choose from over 2200 Apps your favorites for your Android Wear smartwatch. This app is free and has no ads. Find best Android Wear watch apps in our recommendation list. With the built-in app manager you can manage installed wear apps.


New:
★ Discover trending Android Wear apps
★ Manage your Android Wear Apps on phone
★ Stay tuned with our Android Wear newsticker
★ All apps, games and watch faces for Android Wear also online at: http://www.androidwearcenter.com


Features:
★ Modern design
★ Super fast
★ Manage your installed Android Wear apps
★ Recommendation for best Android Wear apps
★ New Apps, Games and Watch Faces for Android Wear are updated continuously
★ News about Android Wear
★ Quick access to top apps
★ Apps and Games are ordered by categories
★ A list of all Android Wear Apps
★ A list of all Android Wear Games
★ A list of all Android Wear Watch Faces
★ Separate listing of all Android Wear Apps, which are promoted by Google
★ No Ads and completely free


Find apps, watchfaces and games for following devices:

► LG G Watch R

Do you have suggestions for improvements? Any ideas or problems with the app. Let us know.
comments: I just installed it to comment on this. I saw where the dev responded to someone's one star rating asking them to review the app again. Here is my middle finger. --NO! We will not review this again if we thought it was pointless! Please go reevaluate your app, you amoeba.

Pointless Useless app, here is why: all of the apps on it aren't even all for Android wear. It's easier to search on google play, which is where everyone found this app. Logic would dictate that this app is useless. There isn't anything on there that is exclusive or even new, just a poor attempt at a "store"  in my opinion.

Unstable product These apps attached to this program is broken.  It doesn't know what it wants to do. I am highly considering returning to Samsung's  Tizen. I feel like I've  wasted my money. I really wanted to believe in android wear.

Do you honestly think that telling someone to review your app again is smart. Wrong, it makes you look desperate for a good rating. Maybe you could listen to your audience instead of sitting on your ass trying to make the best of a bad situation. Lets not forget that these apps arent even exclusive to android wear so they are barely compatible. This app needs serious work.

Good collection of apps, though lists are a little stuttery on my Note 3. I know it's not the newest of devices, but other apps still perform much smoother.    I think it would be useful to have a section devoted to launcher apps, with of course Wear Mini Launcher and Bubble Cloud Launcher on the top but there are a lot of other choices too. I think these -- like launchers on the phone -- will stay to be relevant even if the platform now offers a barebones functionality in AWv5.1.1.

Current samsung wear live Working well so far. Was easier to find apps for Samsung S2 Neo but I really like android wear better. Just more difficult to find apps but after figuring things out has so much more power in Wear.
recentChanges: - Discover trending apps for Android Wear
